title: i see where the city of wilmington is raising awareness for stormwater regulations and has increase fines from 250.00 to 10,000. dollars..why can\'t the county do the same? we that live in developments outside the county have serious problems w/folks not picking up after their dogs..it would be nice if the county would follow suit like the city, since city and county both need to work together to keep the waterways clean
text:
That is a question we can't answer but you could direct to county
officials. thanks!
